name: Cosmic Deadlines
description:
Cosmic Deadlines is an endless runner where you play as an employee working to fix fractures in time. In the game you travel to different time periods to collect artifacts that don't belong there. Try to collect all the artifacts needed for your assignment to get ahead of schedule, or fall behind and time will quickly catch up to you.

Controls:

A/D: move left and right

W/S: float up and down

escape: pause

Controller is supported with the left joystick covering WASD movements and start replacing escape
